title: BOARDWALK / LADDER
description: Savoir Faire White Check to climb up.

dialogueTree.title: Feld Ladder: "The rusty ladder leads to the rooft..."
dialogueTree.text: The rusty ladder leads to the rooftop.

links.title: You: "Assess the situation."
links.text: Assess the situation.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "The distances between the remaining..."
links.text: The distances between the remaining rungs are rather *wide*. You'd have to use the mounting brackets. However, they seem corroded and the peeling rust is razor-sharp.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "In addition, the first rung is goin..."
links.text: In addition, the first rung is going to be *tough* to reach. It's, what, three metres above ground, and you're -- 180...?

links.title: You: "One-eighty seems about right."
links.text: One-eighty seems about right.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "Not to mention that the roof is col..."
links.text: Not to mention that the roof is collapsing and the wind gets pretty brutal up there. Dismounting from the ladder is going to be *hard*. Perhaps if you were to... *not* climb the ladder? Instead...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "What if you were to do something mo..."
links.text: What if you were to do something more *subtle*?

links.title: Conceptualization: "What if you were to *re-conceptuali..."
links.text: What if you were to *re-conceptualize* climbing the ladder?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes -- climbing it would be too *ex..."
links.text: Yes -- climbing it would be too *expensive*. The animations your body needs to make, interacting with the ladder, are beyond your capabilities at this moment in your career.

links.title: Inland Empire: "ASTRAL PROJECTION! Be *open-minded*..."
links.text: ASTRAL PROJECTION! Be *open-minded* about this.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Yeah... Because falling from that h..."
links.text: Yeah... Because falling from that height seems, well -- SPLAT! So don't do that. Just, you know...

links.title: You: "One-ninety. I'm a giant."
links.text: One-ninety. I'm a giant.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "Okay. But, still -- the roof is col..."
links.text: Okay. But, still -- the roof is collapsing and the wind gets pretty brutal up there. Dismounting from the ladder is going to be *hard*. Perhaps if you were to... *not* climb the ladder? Instead...

links.title: You: ""What if I don't climb? What if I j..."
links.text: "What if I don't climb? What if I just... *teleport*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Teleportation is not a thing." The..."
links.text: "Teleportation is not a thing." The lieutenant stares at you, stone-faced.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Even if it isn't -- no one told you..."
links.text: Even if it isn't -- no one told you.

links.title: You: ""It is a thing for *me*. I can't *r..."
links.text: "It is a thing for *me*. I can't *remember* it's not a thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's not how physics work, detec..."
links.text: "That's not how physics work, detective. And even if it were -- wouldn't you need some kind of apparatus? A teleportation field or..."

links.title: Mikael Heidelstam: ""What are they talking about?" the..."
links.text: "What are they talking about?" the kid behind you whispers, asking his father.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Teleportation, Mikael. It's... gen..."
links.text: "Teleportation, Mikael. It's... generally thought impossible."

links.title: You: ""C'mon, Kim. Where's your adventuro..."
links.text: "C'mon, Kim. Where's your adventurous spirit?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This really has nothing to do with..."
links.text: "This really has nothing to do with... adventure. We're dealing with basic physics here."

links.title: You: ""Teleportation *is* a thing. Just n..."
links.text: "Teleportation *is* a thing. Just needs a bit of concentration..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, let's say teleportation is a..."
links.text: "Okay, let's say teleportation is a thing. Wouldn't you need some kind of... scientific apparatus to create a teleportation field? You can't just do it without apparatus."

links.title: You: ""It won't hurt to try.""
links.text: "It won't hurt to try."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes. It could hurt. A lot.""
links.text: "Oh yes. It could hurt. A lot."

links.title: Authority: "He is restraining himself from usin..."
links.text: He is restraining himself from using a parental tone with you right now.

links.title: You: "Teleport to the roof."
links.text: Teleport to the roof.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "All you need to do is close your ey..."
links.text: All you need to do is close your eyes and concentrate. Darkness *enfolds* you. You can *feel* the distance between the bench and the first rung of the ladder. All you need to is...

links.title: You: "Do it."
links.text: Do it.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "*ZOOT*! *ZAP*! *POW*! *CRINKLE*! It..."
links.text: *ZOOT*! *ZAP*! *POW*! *CRINKLE*! It's like magic, you feel yourself disappear, your atoms fading out of existence...

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Oh my god! I can't believe it!""
links.text: "Oh my god! I can't believe it!"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "*BAM*! You find yourself on the roo..."
links.text: *BAM*! You find yourself on the roof... having mastered the art of physical displacement.

links.title: You: ""I did it, Kim! I teleported!""
links.text: "I did it, Kim! I teleported!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I just *saw* you climb the ladder,..."
links.text: "I just *saw* you climb the ladder," the lieutenant shouts from below. "You just climbed it, like a regular person."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No -- not like a regular person. Li..."
links.text: No -- not like a regular person. Like a phase spider.

links.title: You: "Don't gloat. Just stand there like..."
links.text: Don't gloat. Just stand there like a Samaran master.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, for the record, you didn..."
links.text: "You know, for the record, you didn't teleport there. You just climbed the ladder with your eyes closed..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The wind at the top of the building..."
links.text: The wind at the top of the building starts howling loudly, blowing away the lieutenant's voice... faintly you hear...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Never mind... find a way to let me..."
links.text: "Never mind... find a way to let me in when you get inside! Don't go adventuring without backup, especially if we think the suspect may be hiding here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, well. That's impressive, but..."
links.text: "Okay, well. That's impressive, but..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It's not happening. You simply do n..."
links.text: It's not happening. You simply do not have the mind-over-matter athletic capacity to pull it off at this time.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes. Teleportation is completely no..."
links.text: Yes. Teleportation is completely not a thing. Perhaps if you were to, instead, climb the ladder with your eyes closed? This way it's less scary.

links.title: You: "Grab the first rung."
links.text: Grab the first rung.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "It doesn't crumble in your hand, as..."
links.text: It doesn't crumble in your hand, as one might expect. In fact, it doesn't even bend.

links.title: You: "Grab the second rung."
links.text: Grab the second rung.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "Your fingers slip from the rung..."
links.text: Your fingers slip from the rung...

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Officer, be careful! Officer!""
links.text: "Officer, be careful! Officer!"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Brace yourself!"
links.text: Brace yourself!

links.title: Feld Ladder: "The ladder gleams arrogantly with w..."
links.text: The ladder gleams arrogantly with what remains of its metallic lustre as you hit the barrel and tumble onto the ground.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Enough of that now, officer..." Th..."
links.text: "Enough of that now, officer..." The lieutenant pats you on the back. "There has got to be a better, more *age-appropriate* way in."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Hear that? You're old. That's why y..."
links.text: Hear that? You're old. That's why you can't do it. Old and feeble. A let-down. A failure.

links.title: Feld Ladder: "The ladder gleams arrogantly with w..."
links.text: The ladder gleams arrogantly with what remains of its metallic lustre as you hit the barrel and tumble onto the ground.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Careful...""
links.text: "Careful..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "On second thought, maybe teleportat..."
links.text: On second thought, maybe teleportation isn't a thing.

links.title: You: "Why?"
links.text: Why?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Because you're just standing there..."
links.text: Because you're just standing there squeezing your buttocks and nothing is happening.

links.title: You: ""Kim, do you know where I could *ge..."
links.text: "Kim, do you know where I could *get* that teleportation apparatus?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Teleportation apparatus? I don't r..."
links.text: "Teleportation apparatus? I don't remember mentioning anything about teleportation apparatus. Please don't try to *climb* the building, we'll get in another way."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He *did*, he totally said something..."
links.text: He *did*, he totally said something about the apparatus, god damn it...

links.title: You: ""Kim, it isn't happening! I'm not t..."
links.text: "Kim, it isn't happening! I'm not teleporting."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you, eyes wide with fei..."
links.text: He looks at you, eyes wide with feigned surprise. "You're not? Please don't try to *climb* the building, we'll get in another way."

links.title: You: "Don't say the stupid thing."
links.text: Don't say the stupid thing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you with th..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you with that 'I-know-you're-thinking-the-stupid-thing' look -- as you grow tired of clenching your buttocks and give up.

links.title: You: "You're not ready to do this yet. [L..."
links.text: You're not ready to do this yet. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Feld Ladder: "A rusty ladder leads to the rooftop..."
dialogueTree.text: A rusty ladder leads to the rooftop. Some of the rungs are missing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah, that doesn't look good at al..."
links.text: "Yeah, that doesn't look good at all."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You shouldn't attempt to get to the..."
links.text: You shouldn't attempt to get to the roof without the lieutenant here. What if you fall and need to be rushed to the hospital?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You shouldn't attempt to climb this..."
links.text: You shouldn't attempt to climb this ladder without the lieutenant here. What if you fall and need to be rushed to the hospital?
